You've got absolutely nothing to lose by ordering these five pages of temporary tattoos. If you've always wanted to try different designs on different parts of your body BEFORE committing to a permanent tat, order this quality set of temporary tattoos and combine them into different combinations to see how they look. Artfully designed, richly colorful, and offered in several metallic renderings, this is the safest and cheapest way to see if a permanent tat is for you. If not, simply use rubbing alcohol and remove instantly!

And if you are not impressed with the selection and quality, just send them back for a refund. The company offers a "no-questions-asked money back guarantee if you're unhappy for any reason".

A sample of this product was supplied to me for an honest and unbiased review.

These bonnets are so cute; I love the style and design. However, they're too tight for me. I've had to cut the bands on all of them just to loosen them up a bit. Luckily, it hasn't ruined them too much, and they're still wearable. I have a sensitive head and scalp, so finding ones that aren't too tight can be hard. Other than that, I love them.

I thought this was a good bargain when I purchased it but these are not good quality caps. I'm glad I didn't pay any more than I did because I would have been pretty upset. The plastic is thin and the elastic always ends up breaking while I'm wearing the cap (when pre-pooing or deep conditioning). If you only need to wear them for a very short time (under an hour), they'll be fine; just be very careful and gentle with them.

This is a cute and very effective little cuticle pusher. I often neglect my cuticles because it hurts to push them back. This pusher is very gentle, though, and doesn't hurt. It's small, so it's easy to store and can be taken on-the-go with you if needed. Plus, it comes with a little sleeve to keep it in, which is convenient.

It's really to use and has a nice, gridded handle so it doesn't slip out of your hands. I like the curved end that makes it really easy to push your cuticles. It has "U.S.A." nice and big on it, too, for those who preferred products made in the U.S.A. All around, great little manicure tool.

A free sample was provided for evaluation and review.

This is an extremely moisturizing cream that my 4a/4b hair absolutely drinks up!! My hair is extremely dry after washing and letting it air dry (even though I always add a leave-in and oil). So, I decided to use this to help moisturize and twist my hair. I could just feel my hair going from super dry to extremely soft and moisturized from just one application of each section! I also applied this over castor oil, which I applied to my hair beforehand. (I use the L.O.C. moisturization method).

I then twisted my hair and applied this generously (my twist outs always come out better when I'm more generous with my product of choice). After 10 hours or so, I took out my twists and had a very well-defined twist out! There was absolutely no frizz - even after separating each twist (I undo the twist and the split each section in half). I'm really happy with the results.

The pics I'm included are of a two-day-old twist out (I forgot to take a pic on the first day) and my hair still looks great - a little frizzy from sleeping on it, but nothing horrible. I just spritzed on a little leave-in conditioner to refresh my hair and it looked just as good as the first day. This cream is wonderful and allows me to easily go 4-5 days on one twist out - something that many other products just don't do for my hair.

This has a really sweet, pleasant smell to it. It's a white cream that's on the thick side, but very easy to work with and absorbs nicely into the hair - doesn't just sit on top. I also love that it doesn't make my hair feel all crunchy or crispy. My twist out was really soft and my curls were bouncy. Thanks to providing great hold, amazing definition, and complete hydration for dry, frizzy hair, you can't get wrong using this product!

I received this product complimentary in exchange for my honest review. All opinions are 100% mine.

I've been using these for a month now on a weekly basis (a few days each week) and I'm happy to report that none of them have broken! I've had some (from other brands) that have broken on me after just a week or two - these have not done that.

They're really great quality and can hold quite a bit of hair. My hair is really thick and tightly curled and I can easily part my hair into just 6 sections and hold each section tightly and securely with these; they're definitely strong and flexible. It's quite refreshing. Sometimes, depending on how I position them, these can be a little too tight actually. They never slip off or budge at all!

Also, these clips do not pull my hair or get tangled. The colors are very nice too. It's a nice change from the all black clips that I have. They can be a little hard to handle when your hands are wet or have products on them - they get a little slippery. Other than that, I have no complaints.

I received this product complimentary in exchange for my honest, unbiased review. All opinions are 100% mine.
Meh. And that's about it.

I liked the Aveeno lotion. The DOC product was very tiny and had more air than product. Otherwise, I cannot comment as the advertised possible samples were not to be found. Am becoming more and more disillusioned with Amazon.

This is a fake product. In the pic, the can on the left is legit, and this one is on the right. It also says on the back "Not for sale in US", which is where I live. The scent is not like the real product, and the ingredients are different. Cannot return item either, so I am stuck with some knock off that was WAY over priced.
came with a piece of office tape over the top...wondered if it had been used...threw it away...got a refund

Maybe the applicator brush just missed the mark and I never was able to apply this stuff to look decent. Once it's dried it's staying on. It had staying power. I just never could spy it In a way that looked cute. It didn't dry and loom a different color which is a plus with thod stuff so. it did dry a little heavy. But maybe I put it on wrong.

Pre-pandemic my hubby would go get his hair trimmed before it got too long. During lockdown and beyond, he didn’t want to risk getting sick for a hair cut since I’m high risk. So he decided so long as he’s working at home, he was just going to let it grow to enjoy longer hair while he could. As it got longer he started asking me how I people with longer hair tie their hair back without getting a headache. I told him we don’t. Then got offered this for review so I snatched it up.

It helps a lot because it’s not a solid band, so you can sort of tighten it and/or take it off without yanking half of your hair with it. Takes a little tweaking and getting used to. Not sure how it would hold up to more complicated styles, but for just holding your hair back in a pony tail, it’s pretty decent.

I ordered this set and a similar pack by another brand in solids. The solids were so comfy. These, eh, not so much. They’re not horrible, but I 100% notice them and have to readjust these often. I have that issue with a lot of fabric headbands though.

I do love the prints and they’re well made. I will keep them but I wouldn’t re-order them. I suspect I’ll end up tearing out the knot and re-sew it to be just a wide headband instead, I think they’ll fit me better and not slide around as much that way.

Overall: if you find you can wear most fabric headbands without issue, you’ll love these. If you find this style of headband is a gamble where some fit awesome and others slide around or if you have a larger head, these will probably not be your faves.

I'm posting a pic of my hair pre-bleach, post bleach, and post pink dye. I probably didn't need to bleach it but the last time I tried to dye my hair with pinks (two different brands) it just didn't take very well.

This took very well. The kit includes all you need (I used different gloves just because I prefer others). The directions are simple and complete. I would say that if you have hair longer than chin, maybe shoulder length, you will need at least two boxes. I have a pixie cut and used about half of both the bleach and dye. I always follow the direction when bleaching and did follow their directions. I never follow directions when using these "Direct dye" bright colors. Instead of the 30-60 minutes, I left mine in for 5 hours. I got a very vibrant pink (a little more fuchsia than the pictures on the box).

My one complaint is that this definitely left me with more dye rubbing off than some other brands have. When I used other brands I might wake up the next morning to a streak light on my pillow and that was with lot of hair. Using this on short hair, my pillow looked like a pink paintball fight happened. This and all dyes like it will dye anything and everything they touch. So I highly recommend two things - 1. protect everything (your skin around your face and neck with Vaseline) 2. If possible do NOT rinse your hair in a shower/bathtub. If you have access to a stainless steel sink or some kind of utility / laundry room sink where stains won't matter, that is so much easier to clean.

I got this wig yesterday and wore it to a family event and some people didn't know it was a wig. The color is about as dark as my hair would be if I dyed it soft black, which I do sometimes. The curls are a little on the POC side (not the curl type/pattern necessarily, but rather the volume at the root) so I found that bobby pinning some bits down in the back or wearing a headband helped it look more natural for a pale jewish girl. The hair is very soft and doesn't irritate me like my synthetic wigs. However, I think they sent me the wrong length, but I'm not upset about it - for a human hair wig that's this versatile (read: can be worn by a white girl) this price is really great and I understand that on their end things might be hectic. I got a bad haircut a week ago and wasn't able to leave my house, was super depressed, crying all the time when i saw a mirror. This wig is a great solution as the semester is starting in one week and I absolutely have to be on campus. It's less hot than other wigs I have, and I feel confident that this looks natural enough to pass as I start meeting new people at my new school. One thing though is that the wig I received is NOT lace front. Since I gave it full bangs, that doesn't really matter, and I don't care that much about that in general because I will make sure to have bangs with any wig, but I thought it would be lace front and it would have been my first so I was disappointed it wasn't. If you're looking for only lace front, skip this one. But overall I'm giving it 5 stars because I really can't imagine the quality for the price being any better than this.
It's a pretty good formula. I never wear it, but that's because the shade ended up being not quite right for me. It is definitely light and comfortable, though. Not drying.
Oh my god no. My photo represents the best I could do after AN HOUR of trying to use this.

This makeup set is gorgeous let alone a great quality. It comes in a soft leather case with straps you rap and tuck to close making it possible for you to add a few extra items in side. It makes the bag a bit more adjustable if you wish to include a mirror, makeup wipes or even a small flat bag with a few makeup items for on the go.

The brushes all have a wooden handle that feels wooden and not plastic or overly painted. The piece in the center that hold the brush to the handle is fermly attached and does not wiggle or feel loose or missed sized at all. The bush brissles themselves and soft and gental on your skin while still being ferm enough to sweep the makeup exactly in the spot you mint for it to go.

Most of the brushes are cut in a tapered cut and only one was blunt excluding the eyebrow brush. There are a few strans on a few of the brushes that needs a quick trimming but this does not cause a problem to do.

The hairs do not shed and fall out even if you were to pull the extra few longer hairs out. I have only seen maybe 4 hairs comeout even after pulling on them to check or while brushing them across my face.

Each brush is packages with a plastic sleave to protect the brushes. this plastic can be tossed out. Some of the brushes has a more thick plastic on the brissles themselves to protect them and these are reusable.

My lipstick brush was damidged when I got it. The harder plastic cap had bent back half the hair and they would not straiten back out. I did call and ask for a return because I really needed this brush. Once I send it out, I do plan to get a second to replace the one I am having to send back. It is a great quality.
Update, I googled a lot of ways to fix your brushes. There had to be a way to fix it. since it was the only flaw in the entire Bset, I had already opened it and even used it before I even noticed the damage brush I wanted to give a shot at not having to return my product. I tried out a few things to fix the bristles. I found that wedding them, wrapping them in tissue then taping it together or just use saran wrap, I left it overnight and the here's were straightened the next day. I really wanted to give this kit a shot because it is such great quality. It was also a great price. I am glad I was able to fix it without having to return it.

FanArti False Eyelashes and Glue Pen Kit,5 Pairs Fake Eyelash & 2 in1 Design Lash Eyeliner (Black+Clear), Easy to Apply and Comfortable,Tweezer Included,All Day Wear come with a glue pen and an eyeliner pen. You have to test the products on your skin first to make certain you have no allergic reactions before using them. I thought the glue pen is just an adhesive and the eyeliner pen, as with all false eyelash eyeliner pens was magnetic, but I was wrong. The glue and eyeliner seem to be both magnetic. You have to wait until both are completely dry before applying the lashes, as the magnetic properties are what keep your lashes on. The 5 pairs of lashes are all very lovely and there is something for every occasion from work to play to dress up. I wish it had been made more clear that these are magnetic lashes, as I only use glue adhesive lashes, and only hypo allergenic glues to protect my eyes. To remove these lashes with the magnetic liner or adhesive on your eyes, you need a good liquid make up remover and cotton pads. For not making the magnetic properties totally clear even though the lashes are lovely, 3 STARS.

Kids Size Long Wavy Halloween Wig (for 4-12 years old) is a stunning, beautiful wig for costume or play. This wig immediately reminded me of Sleeping Beauty’s gorgeous long curls and color. These curls are absolutely divine in both the ends and bangs. Truly a magnificent princess wig. There are elastic bands at the back of the wig to make it fit any size head. It will fit a small to large head with these clip elastic adjustments. Should the wig be too large for a really young, small child, you can always stitch it closer in the back on the inside. A couple stitches has made any wig tighter, and you can always remove the stitches for a larger child. However, I found the elastic straps hook really tight or looser, so I didn’t have a need for that. The curls are layered for a stunning effect. I love the bangs having those same large curls for a true princess look. The color is a light and gold blonde mix- just gorgeous. This is one beautiful wig for play or costume. 5 STARS.

X-TRESS Classic Realistic Bob Wig Ombre Brown Short Hair Side Part Heat Resistant Fiber for Black Women Synthetic Wigs is a very pretty side part wig. The actual color and style are beautiful and very natural looking. You will not find a more beautiful wig at this price. The wig cap has elastic adjustable hooks, so it will fit your head perfectly. The color and styling are the most beautiful features of this wig. The only thing that gives this wig away that it is indeed a wig, is the part. It’s a little too thick at the part. The black roots blend down into the most beautiful golden brown hair. The wig is styled into lovely blown back waves, which is especially flattering around the face. A beautiful wig in color and style. 4 ½ STARS.

Crystal Rhinestone Gold Tone headband White/Mix color Gemstone Thin Hair Hoop goddess Daily hair accessory for Women Girls is the most comfortable gem studded headband I have ever worn. This is especially nice for younger people who hate the pain of a tight headband, but want to wear one for that special occasion. And this headband is so beautiful, you will want one for that special occasion.

The headband itself feels like a very thin, light metal underneath soft gold fabric. The ends are wrapped yet again with a soft, silky black fabric to sit like a feather behind your ears. The stones are firmly set on a thin metal band which are attached to the gold fabric. What surprises me is this headband doesn’t slip at all on my medium size head. I can also wear it like a crown which looks stunningly beautiful with all the “diamonds” sparkling. It’s the loveliest headband that is beyond soft and comfortable and will make everyone feel like royalty when wearing it for a most special occasion. 5 STARS.

HAIRCUBE Natural Looking Short Blonde Wigs Pixie Cut Dark Root Ombre Blonde Wigs with Bangs Wigs for Women is a beautiful, natural looking wig. The pixie cut is so perfect, I put this on right out of the bag, used my fingers to part it, and couldn’t believe how natural it looks. The wig has elastic around the sides that stretches to fit your head. Around the ears are comfortable flaps. Inside the wig are four tiny combs to keep it in place. As for the bangs, if they are too long, no cutting is needed- just pull the wig back farther.

The color is gorgeously mixed with the darker roots and several blonde colors mixed together for a truly natural look. There is no shiny fake look to the sheen and it’s not too thick, making it so natural. The heaviest part of the hair is where it should be on top of the head and with the bangs layered beautifully. The back is layered perfect as well and is so breathable! You can part it any where and it always looks perfect. The wig also comes with directions and a net to cover your hair. A perfect, natural looking wig right out of the bag!

GETNOIVAS Silver Baroque Vintage Rhinestone Crystal Crown, Queen Crown for Women, Costume Party Accessories for Wedding Birthday Costume Baby Showers Pageant Headpiece Headdress for Cosplay Party is so realistic looking, you’ll think you are a queen wearing this. This crown came in a heavy duty blue box, also wrapped in plastic inside the box. It arrived in perfect condition.

This crown is heavy, made of a strong silver metal and with over 300 tiny, medium and large rhinestones. These rhinestones sparkle like brilliant diamonds. This is without a doubt the most realistic looking crown I’ve ever seen. At the ends of the crown are two loops, so you can add a ribbon or silver tie to keep this securely on your head. The tie is needed, as this crown is heavy. If you want to look like a real princess or queen on your special occasion, this crown will definitely do that. Brilliantly Realistic Crown is beyond gorgeous! 5 STARS.

Green Leaf Flower Crown for Women Baby Breath Eucalyptus Floral Headband Wreath Headpiece (Yellow Sunflower) is so delicate and beautiful. The tiny sunflowers are made of fabric and even though the greenery is made of plastic, it is delicate enough to still look lovely. There are two loops on the brown covered wire ends, which tie with a white ribbon. You can shape this wire circle to any shape to custom fit your head and loosen the ribbon on the looped ends to make it larger. You can also use any color or size of ribbon to customize the look you want. A very delicate lovely tiny sunflower head wreath made so you can customize it for your personal needs. 4 ½ STARS.

Altaba Brown Short Bob Wig With Bangs Natural Looking Bob Wigs For Women 12" Straight Silky Hair Synthetic Heat Resistant Wigs For Daily Party Cosplay Hair Wig is a cute bob wig. This wig is soft, is a beautiful color and easy to cut or style. It is one of those wigs that doesn’t look fake, if you style it a bit to your face shape, or even trim it a bit. The color is nice, a bit darker than the photos show. The wig is made with good synthetic fibers, which you can easily wash and style with heat tools on a low setting. For fun or play, a cute wig for the price. 4 STARS.

N3 No Name Necessary Pore-Minimizing Mattifying Oil and Shine Control Anti-aging Makeup Face Primer Spray (200ml) puts a layer of silky smoothness between your skin and your make-up. I have combination skin- some parts dry, regular and oily. I also have aging skin, so I really didn’t think this primer spray would help me, but it surprisingly did. This comes in a spray bottle and you have to shake the bottle well before spraying, keeping your eyes tightly shut.

It sprays with a fine mist, but has a foaming in it. After spraying, I gently rubbed it more evenly on my face. It dries instantly and wow, my face felt like velvet. If anyone knows about aging skin- your make-up shows the fine lines and wrinkles more exaggerated. This primer spray somehow smooths your skin more, leaving it like a smooth slate for make-up. I am very impressed with this spray, as nothing helps aging skin like this does for make-up, powder, even touch up concealers. A wonderful product. 5 STARS.

Sekass Flexible Velvet Headband Non-slip Wig Grip Scarf Beige Adjustable Wig Hair Band for Women is so wonderfully secure all day. If your head circumference is between 20 to 25 inches, you will get a soft and snug fit. This headband is great as it is totally adjustable. The included invisible nylon hair net with elastic keeps every hair in place. The mesh in this cap is woven with nylon/spandex and keeps your head cool as it’s mesh design is wide enough to breathe.

The velvety soft headband is on the thick side, but it holds so well. It has stretchability and velcro to adjust it tightly to your head. Both the net cap and headband are so easy to apply. I love the fact that the net cap holds your hair in place, no matter how thick your hair, it holds it all in nice and flat, while allowing your head to breathe. Then the stretchy headband holds tight to keep your wig from moving or slipping. No more hair pins, tape or glue, just pure comfort with a secure, soft and snug fit. 5 STARS.

English Laundry Men's 4 Piece 20ml Coffret is a truly wonderful men’s cologne set. You are getting four fragrances- rated 4 and 5 STARS all in one box. The fragrances rated by me are based on my years spent working in a cosmetic factory. I will list each fragrance separately.

ARROGANT- With top notes of bergamot and cedar you get a woodsy freshness to the scent. The middle notes of coriander and lavender bring a warm, clean freshness. At the base are sandalwood, amber and musk bringing a warm, sensual, spicy scent. All together, you get a spicy, warm, woodsy scent with a distinctive freshness to it. This light, sensual scent lasts all day and smells wonderful on almost every man, so 5 STARS.

OXFORD BLEU- The top notes of mint and lemon add a citrus freshness. The middle notes of iris and geranium bring a very light floral scent. The base adds sandalwood and vanilla for a woodsy delicious scent. All together, this scent is light, with an undertone bit of floral and clean citrus and a nice light woodsy smell. This light, woodsy fragrance smells fabulous on almost every man and does last long for 5 STARS.

RIVIERA- With top notes of lemon, bergamot, lime and cedar, you get a refreshing citrus/woods scent. In the middle are jasmine, patchouli, vetiver, lavender and mandarin- most of these were used in the 60's sexy, warm, earthy scents. At the base notes are nutmeg and coumarin to add some spice. This is not for every man, but for a man who likes a more vibrant scent. These scents are very noticeable and not light, being a very woodsy, earthy, warm fragrance with a touch of zest. 4 STARS.

NOTTING HILL- The top notes begin with bergamot, lemon and lime for a clean, natural scent. Then the middle notes have bolder peppercorn and jasmine bringing a rose/herbal scent. At the bottom are cedarwood, sandalwood, amber and a powdery musk for a very potent woodsy, animal musky scent. This is definitely not for every man being very heavy scents. There is nothing light about this fragrance. 4 STARS.

With four interesting fragrances, two being light and two being heavy, every man is sure to find one he will like. Lighter scents always smell wonderful on almost every man and the bolder scents smell great on a man depending on how his chemistry goes with the bolder fragrances. 4 ½ STARS.

LaClaire Eye Firming Serum with Caffeine, Peptides, Botanicals - Best Treatment for Puffy Eyes, Wrinkles, Fine Lines (5 ml/0.5 oz) gave me immediate results in reducing puffiness from not sleeping well. I don’t always get a good night’s sleep and in the morning, the puffiness shows and sometimes dark circles accompany the puffiness.

This Eye Firming Serum works unbelievably fast. The puffiness goes away within an hour. As for dark circles, they do fade out with daily use- you will notice a difference within a week. The main thing I noticed is a tighter, firmer feel of my under eye area. This tightening and firming of the delicate eye area actually does make fine lines disappear. Age spots don’t disappear, but your skin will brighten up.

This Eye Firming Serum is so easy to use. You simply apply a drop or two with the dropper and lightly dab into your skin with a finger. If you do this at night, you will wake up to a firmer skin and it looks brighter, but it’s the feeling of firmness and tightness you will love. Applying a good moisturizer after the Eye Serum really makes your under eye skin look fabulous and feeling hydrated. Keeping the dropper clean after use will result in always having the serum perfect and moist with no dried out particles. Any Eye Serum that can immediately get rid of puffiness from a bad night’s sleep and leave your skin around your eyes feeling firmer and tighter gets 5 STARS from me.

This Vaginal Moisturizer - Vulva Balm - USDA Organic Aloe Free & Natural Vaginal Cream - Intimate Skin Cream - Reduce Vaginal Dryness, Itching & Burning - Estrogen Free Treatment - V. Harmony (1) will relieve a multitude of irritations caused by many different issues. One of the main irritations are pads or tampons. There are many other issues that can cause constant irritations besides pads and tampons- if you’ve ever had a bad Urinary Tract Infection, where you are urinating frequently in pain, the rashes are unbearable. Having a weak bladder at times where you need a heavier pad or diaper causes more unpleasant rashes. It is so difficult to find a cream that will actually help with severe chafing, dryness, pain, itching and irritations. This V. Harmony Vaginal Moisturizer helps immensely with chafing and dryness. But when it comes to helping with severe rashes, itching and pain- make sure you refrigerate this first before applying, because you will be happy you did. Applying this cold is the best relief ever- the pain goes away immediately. Take the time to refrigerate the jar for maximum, instant relief! 5 STARS.

These don’t feel at all like microfiber cloths, more like really soft, thin, fuzzy blankets. You’re supposed to wash them in the laundry machine, then after they dry you wet them before you use them so they can work. I wear a lot of liquid lipsticks, mascara, brow pomade, and other products that can be difficult to remove. I’ve never used the on-brand version of this makeup remover towel, so I can’t compare. I followed all the instructions, and these just plain didn’t work. It made my skin feel raw from rubbing, but somehow it grabbed none of the makeup from my face, except it smeared my foundation around. I’m very disappointed with these towels. They do not work gently, they do not remove even the most basic makeup (foundation) without a ton of painful rubbing. I do not recommend using these.

Ok

The product is advertised as being 100% Aloe Vera, but it’s not!  I was completely disturbed when I noticed the 2nd thing listed is alcohol which dries out anything.  There are a whole lot of other ingredients as well (some I cannot read because of the label attached).  This is false advertisement. This stuff is a joke.  I have shoulder length hair that I color.  Did not moisturize my hair at all.  Conditioner not only left my hair in snarls with no detangling ability, it made my wavy hair fall flat and go pin straight!  There is not any body to it!  I use other products with coconut oil and/or extract that keep my waves intact while boosting the body of my hair.  Product reviews need give particulars about the reactive process of the product along with including the  type of hair, if color processed and if they air dry or blow dry.  "Works great" does not tell the person reading the review anything about how or why the product worked for that person.  However, it does mislead the rest of us into thinking a product will work for anyone.  The review process needs to be changed to include proper descriptions of the customer's reasoning behind their review.  Now I threw away money for  this rotten  shampoo and conditioner from Renpure!

I love this machine, have 3 of them.  Take easy, proceed gradually!  Remember to replace the blades when they become dull. Vanicream is excellent but I find it too greasy. After using this device hydrate your feet n place cotton stockings on. Do this at bedtime too if it's really bad. I love this product, im sorry if some of u have had mechanical problems. I've used 4 of mine n I had one problem w the wire getting broken inside. I called the company n they sent out a new wire immediately. My feet are silky smooth!!  What a mess they were 15 years ago!!!!  TO JOE:  are u reviewing the correct product?  I have 4 of these because I loved them so much n never wanted to be without n u r describing this device incorrectly.  You do no charge this unit. It comes with an electrical cord like an iron n that provides electricity/power. There is no charging. I've had the 1st models n the last for sale models n I think I r reviewing a different device. Another edit!  The customer who said this isn't supposed to be an electric sander is correct.  Yes, it stops if too much pressure, it's suppose to. Another customer said the blade was not rough enuf. Yes, eventually u will need to replace blades, but metal against skin should last quite awhile. I bought several blades when they came down in price. The customers that don't like it seem to be using it incorrectly from the start n misunderstanding the mechanics of it.  It's really great n sad Amazon is not selling it right now.  I have gotten so many people on this device!!!!

This thing is completely useless. It is about as sturdy as a plastic grocery bag, and has no practical use. The real product will not stand up on it's own, and is made of a fabric that is more like bed sheets rather than canvas.

DON'T BUY THIS! It is a complete waste of money and I wouldn't pay a dime for it. If I could give it NEGATIVE stars, I would, but the system only goes as low as one.

I have been battling with coccyx pain for several months and needed a cushion that would support me while suspending my tailbone above the seat. This cushion was no help at all, because the foam was so squishy that it completely flattened out the instant I tried to sit on it. My tailbone was subjected to the same issues of compression and pain that I have with no cushion at all. In fact, it actually made the problem worse, because the foam in this cushion has so little substance that it crawled around underneath me and bunched up under my bottom, creating a large, uncomfortable lump right at the site of the pain! I desperately needed a cushion made of dense, firm, high quality foam, and this is simply not up to that standard. I returned it immediately.

The fortunate thing is that the seller was easy to deal with, and was both cheerful and prompt with my refund. THEY EVEN REFUNDED MY RETURN SHIPPING! So, even though I cannot recommend this specific product, I would not hesitate to recommend the seller for anything else they are marketing on Amazon.

I am sorry that I cannot give anyting better than one star to this cushion, but it really was worse than nothing for my particular problem. I am just glad that Amazon gives me the chance to review the seller's actions in a seperate forum. I was happy to give Cosmetic Solutions the highest rating possible!

[[ASIN:B01F7K1CRC Stone Crop Serum for Face - Natural Skin Lightening Reduces Pigmentation & Dark Spots on Skin, Attacks Wrinkles & Fine Lines - Vitamin C, E & B Complex - 1oz]]

I was looking for a good serum to help my face look good for my upcoming wedding. I am a little older than my fiance but I didn't want my face to show it on my special day. I take the best care of my skin to try to keep it as youthful as possible, so when I had the opportunity to try this serum, I was happy to do so. The serum comes in a screw top and eye dropper dispenser. The bottle is a dark amber colored glass bottle. There is one fluid ounce in the bottle. The serum has a sort of medicinal scent, not unpleasant and not too strong. It leave behind no real scent once it absorbs in. The serum feels refreshing and absorbs quickly and thoroughly into my skin. I feel an immediate pleasant tightening effect and the skin looks smooth and supple almost immediately. I've been using the stone crop serum for two weeks which is not really enough time to be able to tell the full effect of the serum on fine lines and wrinkles, but I do notice softening in expression lines in my forehead and in fine lines and that my skin stays better hydrated throughout the day. There is no burning, redness or irritation with the use of the serum and no product residue left behind. The manufacturer offers a 100% Money-Back Guarantee which I appreciate but have never had a problem with Eva Naturals products before. I am enjoying the serum and consider it a good value at under 19.00 delivered to my door and by the fact that a little goes a long way with only one dropper full of serum enough to do my entire face.

[[ASIN:B01699WMHO Anti Aging Serum - The Best Hyaluronic Acid Face Cream Moisturizer for Anti Wrinkle & Skin Tightening Night Cream. Tempt by Cazbe Skin Care Products Rejuvenate your youthful glow]]

I am always looking for something that will help me turn back the hands of time. I want to look good for as long as I can and because of that I've often used Vitamin C serums. I know they are effective and help with aging skin a lot, My skin has always been a challenge. I have oily skin with large pores and sometimes have uneven and dull skin. I also have some expression lines on my forehead. I wanted to start using this serum as soon as I got it home. The serum comes in a very nice bottle which I like a lot because not only is it pretty but the serum is delivered in an airless pump which distributes exactly the right amount of serum to my fingertips for easy application to my face. Since Vitamin C products are easily oxidized I appreciate the product being dispensed this way so that it protects the serum and keeps it effective. I have been using this serum the morning on cleansed skin after toner, and then again at night before moisturizer on clean skin in the same way. The serum has a nice scent that is not overpowering and it only takes a pump or two of the serum to cover my entire face. The serum doesn't feel greasy or oily and it's just the right consistency to spread easily. There was no burning or irritation with this product, and it absorbs well into my skin with no left over residue. My skin feels smooth, silky and refreshed after I apply this serum as if my face has a refreshing blast of moisture. It looks supple and moisturized for hours and I've noticed my makeup stays on better. I have been using the serum for about two weeks now. Since then I have noticed a lot of amount of improvement in the tone and smoothness of my skin. It doesn't look as dull and my skin also looks firmer. My skin is more radiant and soft and the expression lines in my forehead appear a little softer and the improved clarity of my skin is noticeable. My skin also looks better when I'm not wearing makeup. My skin has improved a little and I've been asked what had I been doing to make my skin look better? That makes me feel more confident that the serum is working. I am going to continue to use this serum and consider it a good value worth every penny of the asking price here since a little goes a long way.

[[ASIN:B01ETWZRL6 # Single For Men, Eau De Toilette 3.3 Fl. Oz./ 100 ml - Inspired By The One Cologne]]

I was looking for new scents or signature scents for my future husband and wanted to try this. I like and appreciate the scent of The One Colognes so this was one I wanted my fiance (Bobby) try this scent. Buying signature scents can become quite expensive to say the least and this is a way for us to get an idea of what a scent smells like with Bobby's chemistry without spending thirty five or forty dollars and then not like it. Besides if this cologne scent stays on and lasts a while we may opt to purchase the less expensive cologne. The seller delivered very quickly and we received packaged well. Since this cologne is an Eau De Toilette Spray, it will have slightly more of the oils (10%) that make the spray smell great than just cologne which has about 7% oil. The scent also is delivered in a convenient spray which me and Bobby both like. The cologne actually smells very nice on him. It's a sort of woodsy, citrus masculine scent and you can definitely smell oranges and ginger in it. The One Cologne describes the scent as "Coriander, Grapefruit, Cardamom seed, Tobacco, Basil, Cedar, Ambre, Ginger, Orange Blossom." Some of those things I have no idea what they smell like, but I'd say this not really a musk based scent but it smells really yummy on Bobby. It takes a little more spray than the original version The One Cologne, however, it's about 1/3 the cost, so I won't complain. It's still pretty strong with a couple of sprays being all he needs. As far as wear, it lasts a long time. It's sensual/manly in it's scent and he said he received several complements on the cologne. It is also a large bottle at 3.3 ounces delivered to the door for under 15.00. We like the cologne and can recommend it.

[[ASIN:B01ETY733E Fantasy Girl For Women, Eau De Parfum 2.9 Fl. Oz. / 85 ml - Inspired By Pink Friday By Nicki Minaj Perfume]]

I have been trying several different parfums and body sprays to help me find a new fresh scent or to come up with my own signature scent by combining two or three scents or wearing one scent alone. The seller does a fabulous job of packaging and delivering quickly. The parfum is very pretty in it's design in a feminine bottle with a curved feminine design that's cute on my dresser or vanity. I like this parfum. It has a sort of delicious smelling fruity scent that is very inviting, but you can also smell musk and a slight hint of sweet floral undertones like jasmine. The scent is nice and soft and doesn't bother or irritate my senses. The scent is not overpowering. It's super difficult to explain how scents smell but all I can say is it really does smell fantastic and it does stay on for a pretty good while. I like how the scent sort of softens and mellows when I wear it a while. It lasts a lot longer if I spray it on my wrist and other pulse points and lingers in the air. I definitely like this parfum and would absolutely say try it for yourself. It's a pretty sensual scent and my finance likes it. This is a 2.9 ounce bottle at under 11.00 delivered to your door. I purchased this product at a discounted price in exchange for my honest review. The discount I received will not alter my honest opinion in any way. Since I count on honest product reviews to make my selections on Amazon, I will always be forthcoming and sincere in all my reviews. No matter if the product is discounted or not, I will leave honest feedback that I base on my own personal experience with the product I receive. I am in no way affiliated with any supplier or manufacturer of goods. *One last note, I wasn't sure what the difference in Eau De Parfum and Perfume is, so I looked it up. Here's what I found on the web on perfume website: Eau de parfum. "After the top notes have died away, the middle notes or heart notes of a perfume become noticeable. This is the focus of eau de parfum which makes it perfect to spray on hair or clothing. (Be careful with delicate fabrics such as silk, though, as they may stain.) The concentration of oils is over 15%, sometimes reaching as high as 20%. Since it is less intense than perfume extract, it is also cheaper, but it usually lasts well and is sold in small sizes." So it is stronger than Eau de Cologne which contains about 7% essence dissolved in alcohol of 60º or 70º, and stronger than Eau de toilette which contains around 10% aromatic essence. But not as strong as Perfume. This is the strongest of scents because of the higher concentration of essences – as much as 40% by volume.

[[ASIN:B00VXEQ0WO Retinol 2.5% Cream From Majestic Pure for Face and Eye Area Will Nourish Your Skin, Potent Anti Aging Formula Reduces the Appearances of Wrinkles, Stretch Marks & Redness, 50ml]]

I purchased Majestic Pure Retinol Cream because I am always looking for something that will help give my skin a more youthful appearance. After all, no one wants to look older or tired. I try all kinds of skin care products and really work hard at keeping my skin in good shape, so I decided I'd give this a try.I was speaking to a friend of mine recently whose skin always looks gorgeous. I asked her what she did to look so good? She is considerably older than me, but has no wrinkling and very pretty skin. She told me that she visits a dermatologist regularly and that she uses a retinol cream and that she pays 60.00 for just a small tube, plus the cost of the doctor visit. Now I am not sure of the strength of the retinoI cream she is using is, and I noticed this is 2.5% so I think that's a pretty effective dosage.The product came in a 1.7 fluid ounce moisturizer. I noticed that the retinol moisturizer also had Vitamin E & B5, Green Tea, Jojoba Oil, Propolis and shea butter. So I thought about Vitamin A or retinol and what it does for the skin. Vitamin A stimulates and thickens the dermis where collagen, blood vessels and elastin are thereby reducing wrinkles and increasing blood flow to the surface of your skin. Vitamin A actually expands the deposit of collagen in the skin; therefore slowing down the normal aging breakdown of your collagen and elastin. I've also read when studying skin care (and I really researched it) that Vitamin A increases blood flow and reduces the symptoms of rosacea, helps heal wounds more quickly, repairs cells in the skin and optimizes UV protection, exfoliates to make the skin more smooth, supple and even and even decreases melanin granules reducing brown spots and pigmentation. Vitamin A decreases sebum (oil) thereby treating acne very well and even helps with the eradication of precancerous lesions of the skin and improves hydration. Skins miracle healer!My mother has always used vitamin E. She is in her 70's and still has beautiful skin and is very selective about what she puts on her skin. I've read that Vitamin E has been used in skincare for so long that it sometimes gets passed over for newer, more exotic-sounding ingredients that are sometimes advertised or added to products. But Vitamin E is a highly beneficial ingredient, a strong defense against free radicals and the damage the environment does to the skin. When it’s combined with other antioxidants, It is an exceptional line of defense for your skin.The product is very good quality with no redness, burning itching or negative side effects. It doesn't leave your face shiny or greasy and seems to absorb within just a couple of minutes. I notice an immediate firming of the skin but no discomfort or a feeling of being too tight. There is no build up or product residue. This product has a nice smell, light and soothing, and is quite easy to use. It's good that the items come in a pump, because exposure to air effects good quality ingredients. A little goes a long way, and the product seems to be lasting a good long time. I use many of Majestic Pure products, and I have had excellent luck with them all and no issues. This moisturizer already is reducing fine line and wrinkles in my skin. It really helps to keep down oiliness and shine off my face. I use this moisturizer on clean skin and I let it soak in, and use under the the throat and jaw line for added firmness. While I am applying my eye makeup, I let the cream soak in. This anti aging skin cream keeps your skin supple and moisturized. So far no complaints or problems and all the products I've tried and it works well for me. I am not affiliated with any supplier or manufacturer of goods.

We are all searching for the fountain of youth! Okay I don't want to look old and wrinkled! The description very much interested me so I decided I was ready to try it here!! I've never tried anything from the dead sea and when I read that the product was made within a few miles of the Dead Sea, with no mineral degradation during transport. I was anxious to give it a try. I try all sorts of things to keep that youthful glow of the skin but I also am selective about what I apply to my skin. Everything was natural here though, and It is not tested on animals, contains NO Alcohol, Sulfate or Parabens and is non- toxic.

The product came in a 1.1 fluid ounce moisturizing serum. This product contains Glycerin and essential Dead Sea Minerals, known for their exceptional hydroscopic attributes and as a source of beautifying minerals. I read that in the description and thought what in the world is hydroscopic...so I looked it up. "Hygroscopy (etymology and pronunciation) is the ability of a substance to attract and hold water molecules from the surrounding environment. This is achieved through either absorption or adsorption with the absorbing or adsorbing substance becoming physically changed somewhat." They perform synergistically (which means together with) Squalane, Dunaliella Salina Extract, Jojoba Seed Oil and Wheat Protein to help increase the skin's moister levels and diminish water loss for a more vital and glowing overall look. After reading that in the description and researching what some of the terms meant, I decided to put the product to the test. I have aging sking that is somewhat problematic with large pores and a few minor areas of sagging skin. I read clearly in the description that Genesea Perfecting Serum helps to disapate the signs of skin aging such as fine lines, wrinkles and sagginess and that you would see effects of the serum in five minutes.

I've been using the serum for a good while now sometimes under makeup and every night before going to bed at night on clean dry skin. The serum is of excellent quality with no redness, burning itching or negative side effects. It doesn't react against or burn the skin. I don't have a problem with it leaving my face greasy or shiny and it quickly absorbs into the skin within just a couple of minutes. I notice an immediate firming and suppleness of the skin but no discomfort or a feeling of being too taut. There is no build up or product residue left on the skin at all. This product has a nice smell, light and kind of floral smelling, but no bad smell at all. It is quite easy to use with an pump dispenser for the serum. I always prefer a pump dispenser as it keeps the integrity of the product by keeping air and contaminants out. A little of the serum goes a long way, and the product is lasting a good long time.

This product really hydrates my skin and make it look nice and firm almost immediately. This serum really works and is reducing wrinkles and fine lines I have starting in my skin. The skin on my face looks so much more supple. It also seems to keep down oiliness and shine off my face. My skin also looks clearer with less break outs and skin problems. I use the serum on clean skin of the face and I let it soak in. I also add the serum all over my face, and under the the throat and jaw line for added firmness and last I add a good moisturizing cream. While I am applying my eye makeup, I let the serums and cream soak in. The face serum contains ingredient that keep your skin smooth and moisturized.

It seems to me that the manufacturers of the product have researched and thought out the effects of this product and have provided a great combination of products to promote beautiful skin. So far no complaints or problems and all the products I've tried appear to be working very well for me.

I like this DMSO product because it doesn't stink so bad. I use it in combination with another aloe vera pain relieving gel and it works. When using any DMSO product you must use care to wash and rinse your hands and the area of application well prior to use. Be sure to rub and massage the product completely into the area. Then wash and rinse your hands thoroughly after use. Care must be taken when using this product but nothing to be afraid of if common sense is used. DMSO is a carrier for whatever you have on your skin prior to applying and it will be carried into your system. So you can't apply sunscreen or bug spray for example and then apply DMSO because you don't want those products in your system.

Then I figured that I'd try one again about a year ago and so I chose the Sonic Spinbrush by Arm & Hammer. I chose the Spinbrush because it had a large brush, which I thought meant less time/effort brushing my teeth.

The Spinbrush worked pretty well, but the large brush head gagged me horribly. Because of this, I decided to give the Oral-B Vitality a try and I like it much better. The first reason I prefer the Vitality is because it has a much smaller brush head (you don't need a large brush with an electric toothbrush, since the toothbrush is doing all the work.) The smaller brush head also allows me to reach places the larger Spinbrush cannot reach, because it's too big. The Vitality is easier to maneuver in your hand as well, thanks to the smaller handle base.

Another thing I didn't like about the Spinbrush is how it would click off automatically after 2 minutes (I don't think all models of the Spinbrush do this, though.) The Vitality purposely sputters after 2 minutes for it's timing function, but then continues it's normal operation after a second or two. I still find this annoying, but at least I don't have to remove it from my mouth, dripping with toothpaste, just to turn it back on. And if I finish early, the Spinbrush required me to punch the button twice to stop it (again, something not easy to do with a vibrating toothbrush in your mouth), whereas the Vitality only requires a single button push. These two things alone make the Vitality much more convenient.

I also think the Vitality is more powerful then the Spinbrush. The reason you had to push the button on the Spinbrush twice was so you could use it at a lower speed if necessary, but I never found that necessary at all. I prefer the more powerful Vitality, because it feels like it's cleaning better by not slowing down if I push too hard.

About the only thing I liked better about the Spinbrush was that it had an indicator light on the base to tell you it was receiving power (I think it gauged the charge, too, but that was never a problem for me.) I'm not sure if that's even important, but it is something I tend to prefer with rechargeable items. Other than that, I love the Vitality and I much prefer it over the Spinbrush. Now I can brush my teeth without gagging and I am thankful for that.

This stuff is terrible. I applied it, Cured it with UV, and it looked nice for a few hours. Then, I was just running my fingers through my hair and one entire gel came off a nail in one whole piece! then another came off in the shower two days later. I wasn't even putting pressure on them, and they didn't chip or come off in pieces, just the whole thing just slid off my nail.

It does color change properly, but it is definitely not worth having a gel come off after less than 24 hours. Most good gels last 2 weeks. I am not unfamiliar with gel polishes; I used to work in cosmetology as a nail technician. I have bought many different brands of gel polishes, including other cheap brands that worked better than this. Not worth it.

This file is sort of nice, but smaller than I expected.  The grit gauge is also not much, so it is better as a buffer than a file for broken nails.  It does file the edge of jagged snags ok, but you do need patience.  I like having a file I don't have to replace frequently. It comes with a little red pleather case that is a little cheap looking; the file itself is a bit cheap-looking as well.  The sides are not totally rounded as advertised, but they are smooth.  The file surface is finely etched.  I do like that I can easily carry this around in my purse for on-the-go filing.

I received this product discounted in exchange for a review--I state this disclaimer upfront because that's what I would want to know first, and I too am disturbed by the ratings inflation on Amazon for IEF reviews lately. I do not indiscriminately give 5star reviews, and they are only given for a fraction of products I try that I find are exceptional and I would buy myself at FULL price. If you wish not to view IEF reviews such as this, click on the filter link to the right of the review section, and then click on "verified purchases only"; that will take most of them out.

Well, I'm overall pretty pleased with this product. I got it hoping I could use it to organize some of my nail polish minis, and it does hold much of my collection. The mini OPI bottles for the most part fit in the lipstick columns, though not all the way in, for some (strangely enough, the Nordic Collection ones are just a smidge smaller and go in smoothly, despite supposedly being the same exact size). That was the main purpose of me getting this, so I'm pleased. I know it was made for other types of makeup, but I already have a system for them; it was all my loose polishes that were driving me nuts. Please note that you won't get many full-size polishes to fit, though the Essie square type bottles make it easier to get as many in as possible. As you can see, I had to put some big bottles upside-down to fit more in. It still had room for my nail brushes, file, foils, tapes, glitters, and cotton balls in the bottom. The material is a very clear acrylic, but it doesn't feel too cheap. One complaint I have is the drawers can get a little stuck; but this is common with these acrylic drawers. Also, the top pc is separate from the bottom drawers, which I don't like. But these are all minor complaints. Overall, pleased it does the job.

DO NOT BELIEVE THE OTHER REVIEWS THE HAIR IS HORRIBLE AND SHEDS LIKE CRAZY! IT IS NOT 100% HUMAN HAIR. WHEN I FIRST RECEIVED THE HAIR, THE PACKAGING WAS NICE  AND THE HAIR WAS SILKY SMOOTH BUT AFTER ONE MONTH THE HAIR GOT MATTED AND DRY. THE HAIR WAS SHEDDING ALL OVER MY BATHROOM SINK AND IN MY BED SHEETS IS WAS EVERYWHERE!!!!!! THE REVIEWS ARE A LIE! I HAVE GOTTEN BEAUTY SUPPLY STORE HAIR THAT WAS WAY BETTER THAN THIS AND LASTED LONGER.  DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS HAIR AND DO NOT BELIEVE THE OTHER REVIEWS THEY ARE LIES THE HAIR IS HORRIBLE. I WASTED MY MONEY AND I I AM A VERIFIED BUYER.....TAKE A LOOK AT THE PHOTOS

Similar consistency to NOW, different flavor.  Main use is a squirt of glycerine in rose or lavender water ( or usually water with a few drops of essential oil) to spritz on my face in the dry Utah winters. Glycerine has been my best (and fastest and cheapest) weapon against persistently dry skin, I've even sprayed it over makeup successfully. This brand has proven to be hydrating. I've started recently using glycerine as well for making echinatia extracts for my kids when they are sick.  Still making first batch  with this brand, but I personally prefer the base flavor of the NOW glycerine to this... I doubt my kids will care though, and I will feel less guilty since this jug is so big/inexpensive in comparison. So far would buy again.

These are really great bottles for making your own cleaning products. So far, I’ve used these for hydrogen peroxide, vinegar, spray stain remover (hydrogen peroxide and dawn), and a floor cleaner (basically alcohol, soap and water). And they sprayer has been great. They are also pretty and not an eyesore if you have them sitting on your countertop. Since having a baby last year, I’ve become much more aware and careful about what I use to clean with. Through my research, I found that hydrogen peroxide is just as effective as bleach and SO much safer. The problem for me was that of it is exposed to light (a clear spray bottle) it loses its effectiveness. Many people just attach a sprayer to a hydrogen peroxide bottle but I wanted something that looked a bit nicer. The only thing I wasn’t happy about is that, like other reviews have mentioned, it was packaged very poorly. It came in a cardboard box with one piece of a cardboard insert to separate the bottles, and even then it only separated two of the bottles, not all four. Luckily, the bottles weren’t damaged, but I find it strange that I’ve purchased mascara that has come with more padding than these had ;) anyway, it shouldn’t deter you from ordering, because these are great bottles at a great price and if they do get broken in transit, Amazon is excellent at replacing and returning items.

Let me start with the fact I bought this for the roller. The roller is plastic? Not metal as generally indicated. Also the two balls roll inward and pinch the skin … it is painful on the face (cheeks particularly) I think I will like it to massage out tight muscles on my shoulders but it is not going to work for the intended purpose at all. The jaw exercisers? These were a bonus, I’m not sure how much I’ll use them- in fact I already have this exact set, going unused that I got for free another time… All around I’m disappointed in this purchase.

So far I’ve only tried to use the free included under eye patches - Smells funnnnnnny like rubber, leaves under my eyes looking yellow. They did give me a LOT of bonus under eye patches like an entire box of them with it which I appreciate but they arnt to useful for me… maybe at night when my skin changing color isn’t important? Haven’t tried the mask yet will update when I do

This Kardashian dry black seed oil is by far the best shining/straightening oil I have ever used in my life. I am on 2 different types of chemo drugs and it has played havoc on my long hair. Kim Kardashian knows her stuff for sure! I have tried at least 30 different products to help with the frizz in my hair. I received a small sample bottle of this in a monthly subscription box I get. A small bottle of this lasted me about 4 months of daily use. I used it right after a wash while my hair was still wet and then right after blow drying and using the straightening iron and then a tiny bit to give my hair that shiny finished, sleek look. Let me tell you, my hair looks and feels like silk after using this. First off, the tangles fall right out. The heat from my iron doesn't damage my hair any longer and my husband says my hair feels like spun silk! This is also a dry oil so there is no oily build up or feel at all. Also, look at the AMAZING price that this is offered at! Wow! I will be heartbroken if they ever stop selling this stuff!
Now, there is only one con to this dry black seed oil. It has a small aroma that to me smells like pencil shavings. Almost like when you were in elementary school standing at the pencil sharpener getting your pencils all sharpened up for your tests! The good news is that the smell doesn't stay in your hair but for a few minutes. Other than that, you can't go wrong with this product!

This is not built very sturdy. T?he base of it, if only it had a metal piece to hold the bottom in place, it would be perfect...... but it has a plastic piece.......... and for this not to be sturdy, is pretty dangerous..

I bought it because I wanted to lay my mom under it as often as possible......... and it almost fell on her.............. and almost gave me a heart attack... she didn't even notice, but omg if it had fallen on her...........

Yes, that's a really big deal....... but...... I'm not properly set up over here either...... I just reallllllllyyyy think they need to do something about the bottom attachment piece to make this thing completely sturdy, because those lights get HOT!!!..........

Also when it showed up one of the lights was broken..... I never said anything to anyone about it though because it was for the night in the middle, and I don't really need that one........ But I probably should have just to get it replaced.

The last negative thing is that it makes a pretty loud humming noise while it's on. And depending on the brightness, it gets louder. (oddly it gets louder as the lights go dimmer....)

But on a bright note........ I can barely ever actually get my mom to get undressed to actually let the light shine on her skin....... (She doesn't know who I am most of the time, so I can't blame her....... ) but one time I was able to get her to....... we laid under it for probably 45 minutes........ and she was in such a bright and cheery mood after we got up.......... it was awesome.

So. Red light therapy really works.......... as far as this product goes.......... the fact that it's not totally sturdy, I think is dangerous, especially if you're in my situation with an older parent......... but it was the best one I could find. I don't regret buying it, but I hope that they replace the plastic piece at the bottom with metal.

It’s pretty, but not so functional. The puff isn’t as fluffy or big as I expected. It’s probably 3” wide. The bottom portion is deep, but if you fill it with powder, it over covers the puff too much and ends up getting everywhere, and there’s no way to shake it off because the puff fits tightly into the deep portion and there’s no way to shake off the excess powder. There’s a middle piece with a center knob thing, which is hard to get out because it fits tightly metal to metal, and I have to use my nail to separate it from the bottom portion little by little, or powder goes everywhere, and even doing it slowly, powder spills. I’ve tried putting powder in the center piece, but the knob thing gets in the way, so I have to use the sides of the puff to get powder from the edges, but THATS better than pouring powder in the bottom portion though, because the puff is stored in that area also, and will get covered in powder, which is overkill. The puff literally has to rest on all the powder if you fill it (Don’t!). It’s just not made for easy use, and powder ends up in places I don’t want it, like on any surface you place the container and center knob thing tray. The cost is okay, if it was functional. It just doesn’t make much sense, other than looking cute if you choose a color you like. I just wanted to dip a puff in a little powder for a light dusting after a shower, and this contraption is just more trouble than it’s worth. I might as well have continued using powder from the bottle, that’s less mess, and quicker.
I didn't like these brushes at all. Shed quite a bit and the handles are flimsy.

I have been using a facial hair remover that I purchased quite a few years ago at Walgreens...it was not doing a good job for more than a year.  I saw this Leuxe  Facial Hair Removal  Shaver and decided to give it a try...I LOVE IT.  Very easy to use, no pain, smooth face.

These nails are truly horrid.  The "easy" pull tabs have to be applied to the nail by YOU, then pull tab and attach to the finger.  But, as you can see from the photo, I applied all ten nails, and immediately the thumb nail came off, then as I was wondering what to do, I began to touch the end of the others, and lo and behold! they were all loose and easily came off, as if the press on tab did not adhere.  I have worn Kiss Impress nails for a number of years.  These nails are prettier (sad is me), but they stay on for up to two and three weeks.  They have an already applied pull tab, so no work except preparing nails to receive them.  Also, this pack had 23 nails only, which matters not since I am returning them.

I have never bought and used a diffuser in my life. I have had hair stylists use them on my hair. This thing was great! It fit on my Conair hairdyer (which has a 2 inch nozzle). My hair is very thick so it takes FOREVER to dry it, but not with this thing! Also I have never been able to style my hair curly without alot of fuzz, until i used this diffuser! The one downside (wasnt that big of a deal to me) is that it dose collapse while using it but it still works! I have only used it once so far so i will write additional reviews if something changes. Oh and it dosent come off of the dryer easily which is good (there are silicon prongs on the inside so it fits the hairdyer). I read alot of reviews before purchasing this one (it was between 3 different diffusers). Hope this helps anyone that is considering buying one.

I got this for my husband (who won't use it because it's tinted) and I tried it.  I don't have a lot of pimples to begin with but when I do I've used this and instead of them lasting for DAYS, they go away very quickly.  I had one that was gone the next morning.  Very surprised at how well this works.  I don't notice a smell to it and I'm pretty sensitive to that kind of stuff... But I've never needed to use more than a teeny tiny dab so that may be why.  It's a good price too so give it a try!  On a side note: I could do without the tint personally but it doesn't sway my opinion on how well it works.

I bought two, one for home and one for work.

The home one is great- best comb I have ever owned, by far. Works great for the beard, and I end up using it on my hair as well.

The one at work smells awful. I let it sit for a while to air out, but that didn't help. I washed it repeatedly, but that didn't help. On one side, the surface isn't smooth - it looks like half of that side of the comb was gouged. The good comb is smooth on both sides. This one smells strongly like rotting fecal material. It isn't getting any better. I grew up with horses, and worked on a cattle ranch. I can tune out a certain amount of odor, but this is repulsive. I don't want it anywhere near my beard.

If I could be sure that this is just a random bad comb, I would buy a new one to replace it, but at this point I have one good and one bad. Those aren't good odds.

Update - I let the smelly comb sit in the back of my closet for a couple months. Every now and then I soaked Eucalyptus essential oil into the scratched up side of the comb. It doesn't smell anymore.

I was given the opportunity to review Keeva's tee tree oil shampoo and fell in love with it right after first use. I wasn't around to when they were selecting reviewers for their conditioner but now that it's available for purchase I'm glade to say I've bought it for full sale price being 20 USD. Like it's shampoo counterpart the bottle is 28oz total.

Texture: White and creamy
Scent: Pleasant and definitely not reeking of tea tree oil like it's shampoo sister
Slip: Slip is a product's ability to allow one to detangle hair effectively and not need to use too much product to do so. For the amount I used which is pretty standard across the board with all conditioners I've tried, this conditioner is rated at 5/5 for slip
Moisture: Next to none but that isn't a real issue due to most of the oils being found in Keeva's tea tree oil shampoo
Standout Ingredients: hydrolyzed keratin ( protein ), argania spinose ( Moroccan argon oil ), cetearyl alchol ( fatty alcohol )

Cons:
Cocos nucifera ( Coconut Oil ) isn't listed as an ingredient, however it is featured as an ingredient on the front of the bottle.
Melaleuca alternifolia ( Tea Tree Oil ) isn't listed as an ingredient either.
Both of these oils is on the front of the bottle being featured however, the product doesn't list the oils as ingredients.

Overall, I believe this to be a quality conditioner even better than some brands found in salons. Price of the bottle is reasonable for the quantity received. This conditioner does provide one with good slip and it doesn't leave hair feeling heavy or weighted down after rinsing. I feel that when used with it's sister shampoo, you'll benefit from this conditioner most .

This shea butter is a good quality shea butter. It is ivory and reasonably priced. As a person whose been using shea butter for well over 10 years for ecezma treatment I can say that this shea butter is a quality product. Although it is a quality shea butter, the way it has been processed left the butter very grainy and not as creamy as I was expecting. It is a thick, heavy butter that is solid at room temperature and has a lot of use for hair and body purposes. It is sourced from an area in Africa that doesn't produce a real rancid smelling butter. It smells distinctly like shea but not like the shea sourced from more eastern countries. The butter when applied to the skin feels thick and heavey but that isn't a problem for me. I would need to indirectly melt and re-solidify this butter in order to smooth it out and kill the grainy texture it comes with. I'd also whip this butter to make it creamy.

Price: Reasonable
Texture: Grainy but not too smooth, sort of like peanut butter but thicker
Color: Ivory, more of an off white, cream like tone
Scent: Hard to describe but it's distinctly Shea which never smells pleasing

Overall, this company's shea butter is a good quality butter, high quality for some but for me good/decent due to the fact it's grainy and doesn't have the smooth texture I'm used too. The color is normal and the butter feels thick, heavy and heavenly on thick dry skin like eczema. I'd recommend this company's shea butter and possibly repurchase in the future.

•This quality shea butter was purchased for a promotional price in exchange for my unbiased and honest review.

This iron is mediocre in performance and quality. The iron is very heavy to hold and has a semi long heat up time. This isn't an iron I'd honestly recommend and the price the company charges full price is outrageous for the quality of this iron.

My hair texture is 3C/4A and it is relaxer free. It requires high heats to lay flat. All of my irons is set to 450 degrees when in use. Before any flat ironing can begin I start with clean freshly shampooed and conditioned hair. I then blow dry, prestreching it so that it is easier to iron out. I use a blow out cream which also protects my hair from heat damage and a vented brush when blow drying. After I'll apply a argon oil serum and a frizz busting serum to my hair. These oils aide in getting my hair to lay flat with out any frizz.

Iron snagged my hair upon first use. I thought that maybe it was user error but it wasn't as the second time I ran the iron across a different section of hair it was snagged. I also had issues with my iron staying on. The placement of the on and off switch makes it very easy to turn this iron on and off while in use. The iron didn't even stay plugged in when I was using it. I was constantly giggling the cord to get it to turn back in. This iron doesn't glide down a section of hair well. It is very choppy thus leading to the snagged hair I spoke of earlier. The iron does swivel while in use making it easy to use. It goes up to 450 degrees but it's very difficult to maintain any temperature selected on this iron.

I don't recommend this iron simply due to the fact it snags at hair. It does work to smooth down hair but it doesn't work well as it cannot guide down smoothly. The only good thing about this iron is the fact it is very attractive to look at. I'm happy to say that I didn't pay full price as I received this for a promotional price. Had I paid full price I would have promptly returned this iron.

*** In exchange for my unbiased and honest review I received this iron for a promotional price.

I love how easy this flat iron hair brush is to use. It heats up very fast and gets super hot so do be careful. I have a natural wave to my hair and will use a flat iron to straighten my thick hair. It usually takes me about 15 minutes to get my hair done but with this new flat iron hair brush it only took me 9 minutes. Being a mother of three children, every minutes counts so I was delighted to cut an average of 6 minutes off of doing my hair. I should add that my hair was soft and shiny after straightening likely due to the built in Ionic generator. I also love that it has 5 heat settings allowing me to pick the one that works best for me.

Pros:
- Heats up very fast.
- Easy to use.
- Power cord is 78" long and rotates.
- Built in Ionic generator.
- 5 heat settings with LED display.
- Automatically turns off after 45 minutes making it safer to use.

Cons:
- It's heavier than most flat irons.

Overall, I really do love this flat iron hair brush. It works well and makes the hair straightening process much quicker.

I have been using this cream on my stomach and behind/between my thighs, twice a day, for over a week now. I can happily say that I am seeing results! I have been doing patches on my back thighs to help with cellulite but I am only using the cream on my stomach and inner thighs. I am so excited to see how much more dramatic the results will be. I noticed another reviewer was brave enough to post pics of her results and they were amazing. Just be vigilant and apply it twice a day, every day and you should see results.

Directions for use are to apply a suitable amount of cream to the target area while gently massaging in a circular, upward motion. You can apply it twice a day, morning and evening.

Overall, I am very pleased with the results!

I waited to write a review on this product because, at first, I was not sure about it.  The product is well packaged and easy to use.  I am 54 years old and after the first night I used it, I woke up the next morning and my face was red and a bit swollen.  At first I thought maybe I was having an allergic reaction.  I noticed after one use my skin was much smoother, as if the top layer of dead skin came off.  I gave my face a few days of a break, as this product seems to be a strong one, and reluctantly tried it again.  I did not have the same reaction with the redness and swelling.  So I kept using this product, but as it is a strong one, I use it only 2-3 times a week.  After about a couple of weeks using it, I discovered all kinds of undesirable things coming out of the pores of my skin, I developed little pussy sores and pimples, but the pimples were not like the regular pimple, these were deep and what came out was really think and sometimes hard.  Instead of having what I thought was an allergic reaction, I think this product was pulling impurities out of my skin and detoxing it.  I also had a couple of small, sebaceous cysts on my forehead and after about a month of using this product, they were gone!  I was told by a plastic surgeon the only way to get rid of them was surgery but I didn't want the scar on my forehead so never had anything done about them, I had them for years.  To this day, the cysts are gone.  My skin no longer reacts as if impurities are being pulled out.  There is still a small amount of burning on the nights I use this product but if I follow it up with argon oil or rose hip oil, the burning goes away.  I've noticed my skin is a firmer, smoother in texture, very soft, and the skin tone is more even.  Although I got amazing results, this product may be overpriced considering it is only ascorbic acid.  Maybe the products in the activator justifies the price but as I'm not an expert on ingredients, I'm not sure.

I CHOOSE THIS RATING BASED ON MY FEELING UPON SHIPMENT, THIS ITEM LOOKS EXACTLY AS PICTURED  THE SIZE IS RATHER SMALL BUT REASONABLY PRICED, I WOULD RECOMMEND TO ANY ONE INTERESTED IN SUCH ITEMS AND WANT A FAIR PRICE.

I got my Crave brow and lash brush for $1 (with promotional code) and it came in two days. Packaging is so cute and darling! I love it! As for the products themselves, I would be careful with the spoolie. It is very delicate. Like the glue would come out and it will fall off from the stick. The angled brush wasnt on my spoolie by the way. It seems the glue came apart and it fell off. Does it work? Yes. It does what the applicators are intended for. Is it worth what I paid for? YES. It is worth what I paid for ($1.00) will I buy this at retail price?! Probably not. With another promotional code? Definitely! I absolutely love the package it came in though. It's very girlie. I'm keeping it on my vanity. Friends will definitely ask where it came from :)

I take Epsom salt baths occasionally to help ease the aches and pains from working out. When I came across this, it caught my eye as I love the scent of lavender and the product description says it soothes sore muscles.

The first time I used it, I ran into a problem. There were no instructions on how much to add in the bath. So I searched the internet and it's basically based on how strong you like the scent. I used far less than what I would for Epsom salt. Maybe a few tablespoons. It was plenty strong. I've had better smelling lavender bath products than this one. Furthermore, after taking a bath, my muscles didn't feel any better. I feel an improvement when I use Epsom salt.

Won't be using this product again between the disappointing scent and inability to soothe tired muscles.

I was super excited to wear these. I’ve worn lashes before, usually around Halloween, but this was for a special night out with the hubby in my birthday. I opened the box only to find the lashes had actual small magnets on them. They both stuck to the packaging and took forever to peel off. Two magnets weren’t even attached to one of the lashes, but we’re attached to the box. I did try them out but ended up not using them. On my trial run, the one that was missing a couple magnets wouldn’t stay on well, and the other one just felt bulky. The one with all the magnets did stay on! So if you’re used to wearing them it may be something to try.

Now, I will admit I’m not a typical lash wearer. I can feel when I’m wearing mascara and eyeliner. I just don’t wear much makeup aside from bronzer and eyeliner. I’m also no stranger to getting dolled up and going a full night at a party in lashes either. These were just very disappointing.
Wanted something for travel. Its charging port is broken in a few months. Now I have to repurchase

The color is a pretty pink, somewhat bright but sheer enough to be very wearable. The problem is that the lip balm is heavily scented, and the perfume makes my lips dry and slightly irritated. Wish this didn't have so much fragrance, I'd give it a higher rating. Walmart carries these for around $5 each, by the way.
These are great for having no pain but the plastic clips slip off when rolling my hair.  I guess I'll use them at night and use my self-grip rollers (which work really great) the rest of the time.
